document.full_text: this series will be the first real test for miami's big three, going against a group whose own big three was assembled four years earlier and won a championship in its first year together.
document.title: sooner or later, the celtics were expecting to face the heat
lines_and_colors: this series will be the first real test for miami's big three, going against a group whose own big three was assembled four years earlier and won a championship in its first year together.
